about_the_game:
Welcome! It’s time to start your very own medieval manuscript workshop - the Scriptorium.



Create amazing medieval illustrations! Fulfil orders from prestigious patrons by making your own designs on pages of medieval books. Create, get paid, and unlock new orders, design elements, and grow your workshop. And with time and practice, your works and fame may reach the Queen herself!



A colourful cast of clients will send you their requests. Some might want illustrations depicting grand battles between snails and dogs. Some might want more quaint scenes of peace, love, and the plague. And some might come with, how should we put it, *cough*, more bizarre requests. But it is not up to you to judge! Oh no! Your duty is to have fun as you’re fulfilling their wishes, your way.



And as your illustrations spread across the land and your workshop grows in both stature and fame, you will create artworks fit for the ages, acclaimed by Kings, celebrated by Bards, and adored by historians for centuries to come.



Create beautiful (or weird) medieval illustrations (or memes) and become the Queen’s favourite artist!

Key features


  • Illustrate your own medieval manuscripts however you like
  • Over 1,000 unique elements to unlock and use
  • Grow and personalise your workshop with buyable items
  • Super-detailed manuscript sandbox where your creativity can reign supreme
  • Each illustration element is based on real-life medieval manuscript art
  • Fulfil custom commissions from your favourite let’s players and medieval content creators
  • Export your in-game designs and create medieval memes to share with your friends

Ink-in Scriptorium: Master of Manuscripts to your Steam Wishlist!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2430M CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 555M or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6400 or AMD equivalents
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Run your manuscript workshop, receive orders to illustrate medieval books, decorate them any way you like, send them back to clients to get paid, and unlock new jobs, decorations, and items. Welcome to your very own medieval scriptorium!
